bug.summary: Test metrics are no longer pushed to Comet.ML (and perhaps others)
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
PyTorch Lightning 0.7.2 used to publish test metrics to Comet.ML. Commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/commit/ddbf7de6dc97924de07331f1575ee0b37cb7f7aa>ddbf7de</denchmark-link> has broken this functionality. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior: Run fast-run of training and observe test metrics not being submitted to Comet.ML (and possibly other logging destinations). <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>cuda: GPU: Tesla T4 available: True version: 10.1 packages: numpy: 1.17.2 pyTorch_debug: False pyTorch_version: 1.4.0 pytorch-lightning: 0.7.4-dev tensorboard: 2.2.0 tqdm: 4.45.0 system: OS: Linux architecture: 64bit
processor: x86_64 python: 3.6.8 version: #69-Ubuntu SMP Thu Mar 26 02:17:29 UTC 2020 </denchmark-code>
